content: I'm open to exploring fusions of jazz with other genres. In fact, I've been listening to some jazz-rock fusion lately and really enjoying it. I think it's interesting to see how different genres can influence and inform each other. As a collector of vinyl records, I'm always on the lookout for unique and eclectic sounds. Speaking of which, have you heard of the jazz-rock fusion band Mahavishnu Orchestra? I recently picked up their album "Birds of Fire" and it's been blowing my mind.
